summary: A male nurse steals some of one of his patient's drawings and makes money with them.
cast: Alberto Laiseca|Sergio Pangaro|Andrés Duprat|Enrique Gagliesi|Ana Laura Loza|León Ferrari|Horacio González|Rodolfo Fogwill|Luciana Fauci|Diego Perdomo|Arturo Caravajal|Alejandro Cohn|Marcello Prayer|Roberto Tacón|Mónica Duprat|Bárbara Hang|Federico Novick
title: El artista
